screens.name: New_Hospitalization_Record_Both_Error_Screen
screens.label: New Hospitalization Record Both Error Screen

validationRule.errorMessage: Not more than 50 Characters are allowed.
Not more than 100 Characters are allowed.
Date of Admission must be before the Deactivation Date.

fields.name: Copy_2_of_DOA_ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: Date of Admission must be before the Deactivation Date.

validationRule.errorMessage: Date of discharge should always be greater than Date of Admission

fields.name: Copy_2_of_Facility1_ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: Please select valid Facility. Date of Admission must be before the Deactivation Date & Facility on Product must be equal to the Facility on Account.

fields.name: Total_Cost_Override_B
fields.helpText: Maximum field limit is Integers 14, Decimals 2 [Ex: 12345678901234.12]

validationRule.errorMessage: Not more than 100 Characters are allowed.
